text: Sex o no sex is a 1974 Spanish comedy film directed and written by Julio Diamante. It is composed by Carmelo A. Bernaola and it is starred by Don Jaime de Mora y Aragón, Antonio Ferrandis and José Sacristán. It was the penultimate film directed by Julio Diamante and the third one whose cast is composed by José Sacristán and Carmen Sevilla. ==Cast== * Carmen Sevilla as Angélica * José Sacristán as Paco Jiménez 'Don Paco' * Antonio Ferrandis as Director * José Vivó as Psicoanalista * Ágata Lis as Chica sexy * Lola Gaos as Tía de Angélica * Carmen Martínez Sierra as Dama solitaria y confiada * Sergio Mendizábal * Margarita Calahorra * Montserrat Julió * Sandra Dos Santos as Chica sexy en el tren (as Xandra Dos Santos) * Pedro Mounier * Don Jaime de Mora y Aragón as Tomás 'el muestras' ==References== ==External links== * Category:Spanish comedy films Category:Spanish films Category:Films directed by Julio Diamante Category:Films scored by Carmelo Bernaola Category:1974 comedy films
title: Sex o no sex
